en: Mrs Susanna Hoare and Child, 1763-4, The Wallace Collection

Some additional images which are referred to in the Catalogue entries of the Technical Bulletin can be viewed by following the links below.

en: M1398: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Susanna Hoare and Child, , 132.5 x 101.6 cm, after cleaning and restoration. The Wallace Collection. (7534x5715px)

M1398: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Susanna Hoare and Child, paint cross-section from top egde, left end of sample showing the double-ground layer with an intermediate layer of glue size. The Wallace Collection. (1404x4152px)

M1398: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Susanna Hoare and Child, paint cross-section from top egde, left end of sample showing the double-ground layer with an intermediate layer of glue size, ultraviolet fluorescence image. The Wallace Collection. (1404x4152px)
M1398: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Susanna Hoare and Child, paint cross-section from top egde, right end of sample showing the thin pinkish-red priming. The Wallace Collection. (1404x4152px)

M1398: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Susanna Hoare and Child, paint cross-section from top egde, right end of sample showing the thin pinkish-red priming, ultraviolet fluorescence image. The Wallace Collection. (1404x4152px)

M1398: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Susanna Hoare and Child, photomicrograph of the top edge showing the edge of the blue sky with some pink priming visible and the textured ground layer.. The Wallace Collection. (3120x4164px)
M1398: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Susanna Hoare and Child, X-radiograph (Computer assembled mosaic). The Wallace Collection. (16398x13310px)

M1398: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Susanna Hoare and Child, X-radiograph (Computer assembled mosaic), with the effect of the painting stretcher reduced by digital manipulation. The Wallace Collection. (16398x13310px)
M1398: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Susanna Hoare and Child, unmounted fragment of paint from the child’s knee. The Wallace Collection. (1224x1968px)
M1398: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Susanna Hoare and Child, paint cross-section from child’s knee. The Wallace Collection. (1440x3240px)
M1398: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Susanna Hoare and Child, photomicrograph showing grey underpaint below pink flesh paint on the back of the sitter’s hand. The Wallace Collection. (3120x4164px)
M1398: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Susanna Hoare and Child, paint cross-section from greyish shadow on sitter's proper left sleeve. The Wallace Collection. (1248x4152px)
M1398: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Susanna Hoare and Child, paint cross-section from greyish shadow on sitter's proper left sleeve, ultraviolet fluorescence image. The Wallace Collection. (1248x4152px)
M1398: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Susanna Hoare and Child, photomicrograph of yellow flower on drapery. The Wallace Collection. (4164x3120px)

M1398: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Susanna Hoare and Child, paint cross-section from yellow flower on the drapery, at left edge where the dress overlaps the landscape. The lowest layers in the sample, containing mixtures of lead white, iron oxide red, Naples yellow and a little ultramarine, relate to the underlying background landscape. The Wallace Collection. (1284x2976px)

M1398: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Susanna Hoare and Child, paint cross-section from yellow flower on the drapery, at left edge where the dress overlaps the landscape, ultraviolet fluorescence image.  The Wallace Collection. (1284x2976px)
M1398: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Susanna Hoare and Child, paint cross-section from dark green paint of foliage at the left edge. The Wallace Collection. (1284x4164px)
M1398: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Susanna Hoare and Child, paint cross-section from dark green paint of foliage at the left edge, ultraviolet fluorescence image. The Wallace Collection. (1284x4164px)
M1398: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Susanna Hoare and Child, paint cross-section from green paint of the foreground, lower right. The Wallace Collection. (1164x4164px)
M1398: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Susanna Hoare and Child, paint cross-section from green paint of the foreground, lower right, ultraviolet fluorescence image. The Wallace Collection. (1164x4164px)

M1398: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Susanna Hoare and Child, paint cross-section from sky at upper right, containing both smalt and ultramarine mixed together in the same layer of blue paint.  The Wallace Collection. (936x2928px)
M1398: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Susanna Hoare and Child, paint cross-section from sky at upper right, ultraviolet fluorescence image. The Wallace Collection. (936x2928px)
